text: A Yank in the RAF is a 1941 American World War II adventure movie directed by Henry King and starring Tyrone Power, Betty Grable, John Sutton, Lester Matthews, Reginald Gardiner, Ralph Byrd, Frederick Worlock. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1941. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 war movies Category:1941 adventure movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: A Yank in the RAF
